content: ELTE Faculty of Informatics in collaboration with Robert Bosch Ltd., established industry driven, R&D&I oriented department in order to carry out research, development and teaching in artificial intelligence theory, technologies and their applications. ELTE invites applications for position of Head of Department. For details please follow the link: https://www.inf.elte.hu/content/head-of-department-of-artifcial-intelligence.t.2871?m=502
